TopicTitle: [Linux] "Warp Here" leaves time warp at 50x on exit when it was at 1x on entry

Articles.Content:
This is 32-bit linux steam, 

build id = 00842

2015-05-01\_14-01-57

Branch: master

Not sure what produces this, but I've got a video and a save. Every so often I do a "warp here" and it just warps right past it at 50x or at any rate lots faster than it was when I started the warp). Doing what's in the video reproduces this every time for me.

I'd really prefer to use quicksave as a backstop against my own screwups.

video:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7vveQtBT5bg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

requested docs in [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3BGQdoSFUWMaTdnNy1QQVk2OGc/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B3BGQdoSFUWMaTdnNy1QQVk2OGc/view?usp=sharing) -

Thanks for this game. I think its biggest bug is, I can't achieve escape velocity ...

It's a bug, if you exit warp and have a periapsis low enough that it limits you to physwarp KSP gets confused.

Dunno what you mean about not being able to reach escape velocity though.

I was speaking metaphorically - always seem to find myself back playing this game . . . 

:-)
